title: Write the Alt-Self
summary: Describe the version of you who doesn’t run this loop.
description: If this loop didn’t exist — what would you feel like? What would you do differently? Write the version of you on the other side of it.

flow.\ud83d\udcdd Step 1: Drop the Frame: Message: 'Without this loop, I would feel [emotion], think [thought], and do [action]'
flow.\ud83d\udc64 Step 2: Name the Version: Optional: give them a name, symbol, or codeword
flow.\ud83e\ude9e Step 3: Ask the Mirror: 'What’s one trait of this Alt-Self I can channel today?'

optional_recast: Revisit the Alt-Self monthly. Update their energy.
absence_response: The alternate version stayed in the shadow today. No pressure to meet them yet.
notes: Naming the self that isn’t looping shows you that you *are not your loop.*
The Alt-Self already exists in symbolic space.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: What symbolic trait does this Alt-Self represent?
amplification.miss_response: 🕳 The Alt-Self stayed quiet. Perhaps next time.
